bug.author: again4you
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Issue Description</denchmark-h>
If CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release is defined when running cmake command, unused variable occurs as below. The main reason is that NDEBUG is automatically defined when building Release mode <denchmark-h:h2>How to Reproduce</denchmark-h>
$ mkdir build & cd build $ cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release $ make <denchmark-h:h2>Error message</denchmark-h>
[ 69%] Built target nnstreamer_customfilter_scaler_allocator /home/again4you/nnstreamer_work/ref_repo/nnstreamer/nnstreamer_example/custom_example_average/nnstreamer_customfilter_example_average.c: In function ‘set_inputDim’: /home/again4you/nnstreamer_work/ref_repo/nnstreamer/nnstreamer_example/custom_example_average/nnstreamer_customfilter_example_average.c:61:12: error: unused variable ‘data’ [-Werror=unused-variable] pt_data *data = private_data; ^ [ 72%] Built target nnstreamer_customfilter_opencv_scaler /home/again4you/nnstreamer_work/ref_repo/nnstreamer/nnstreamer_example/custom_example_average/nnstreamer_customfilter_example_average.c: In function ‘pt_invoke’: /home/again4you/nnstreamer_work/ref_repo/nnstreamer/nnstreamer_example/custom_example_average/nnstreamer_customfilter_example_average.c:112:12: error: unused variable ‘data’ [-Werror=unused-variable] pt_data *data = private_data; ^

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/957>#957</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
